metadata.title: CVE-2021-47347 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wl1251:Fix possible buffer overflow in wl1251_cmd_scan Function wl1251_cmd_scancalls memcpy without checking the length. Harden by checking the length iswithin the maximum allowed size.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
